tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was having pain in teeth muscles so I consulted DrAtul. He initially gave me medicine for pain relief which worked but not for longer time. I had pain in Upper tooth muscles which was causing great difficulty while eating specially roti. My tooth location is beside wisdom  tooth. We discussed as I was finding great difficulty in eating solid stuff so Dr Atul suggested me to wear Splints they are like cap which are to be worn only when we sleep. Yes there. was a option also for tooth extractio. but it wasnt permanent solution as our teeth are connected with many nerves so its not always assured our problem will get solved after extraction and moreover motto was to save teeth of Dr Atul which he succefully has done. Splints is nothing but nightguard for your teeth so your muscles are relaxed and we are pain free.Inmy case it was not so easy to operate and settle issue as it was upper teeth which arent so easy to operate. I went to other doctors they said we can remove wisdom tooth and see whether problem gets solved of which i was not sure as my wisdom tooth was no where in pain.Dr Atul suggested for the nightguard which is to be worn thereafter permanently but believe me this thing has saved my teeth from surgery or any such niot so sure ways. Yes i too got suggestion for braces and retainers from other doctors but thats time consuming and more expensive I Was in need for some effective and quick solution so i can start eating normally. I would recommend in my case it wasnot so easy to even speak for few days. Dr Atul has given me a treatment of splints which i have to wear daily and forever but most important moral from my case is DR Atul has saved my teeth . by reading ull can understand it wasnt a normal dental condition but if we have such efficient doctors who believes in preventing my teeth and curing by just wearing night guard then i feel its highly recommended to look for such solutions as old is gold and hold till we have such effective dental experts. By reading ull may feel i have easily eqipped with splints but believe me i can now eat all stuff of which i got restricted due to pain. Thank you for reading. Thank You DR Atul.
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback Komal. It can be really helpful for many patient who are having unexplained symptoms without real dental issues.

review: I visited Dr Atul's clinic for tooth sensation and tooth cap replacement along with the root canal treatment. Dr. Atul treated me as if I was a family member during all my meetings with him.He always explain very small small technical things in a decent manner.The treatment was undoubtedly successful.His supporting team is also dedicated and hard working.As far as treatment cost is concerned the quality of work is very good enough and worth for the same. I want to thank Dr Atul and entire supoorting for everything.God Blessüôè

context: Dental Examinations,Dental Deep Cleaning,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Implant,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: i am very happy to finally have found a dentist who i can trust for the right treatment. I had met with a minor accident which affected one of my upper front tooth and have visited a few dentists who after 2-3 visits were neither willing nor able to explain the prbs of random and intense tooth aches, swelling, discoloring and just wanted to fill their pockets. But Dr Atul was very polite and showed genuine concern for smallest of my prbs and am feeling better after visiting him. He explained properly what is necessary to do and what is not and finally feeling my treatment is on the right track. Highly recommended. 5 star doctor.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable opinion..

Doctor was nice,the most important thing for me was the relief of the pain which was happening due to dental abscess.That was untolerable pain which I experienced.He explained everything nicely,told about all the possibilities and approaches to this abscess and went ahead.
Everything went well without pain,now theres no pain and my smile is back to normal.
Thanks  a lot Dr.Atul Indurkhyaüòäüòäüòä

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He spoke nonstop for 40 mins. And finally sold me a mouth guard for 4500/* ***** * *** *** ***** *** ******* **** * *** **** ** ***** ***** ********
reply_text:
Archanaji thanks for your feedback. I had explained in detail to you because I don't want you to go through unnecessary dental treatment.
Suggested you to wear that device known as ‚Äòanterior deprogrammer‚Äô which is a diagnostic tool as well as a treatment appliance to be very sure that your pain is of Muscle Origin and NOT the Teeth (as commonly happens) as the X- Ray also suggests. I asked you to use it for a week and give me feedback. Hence I have NOT even charged you in advance for the treatment - have told you fees will be taken ONLY AFTER you feel relief from pain which I‚Äôm confident of as this has worked in several of my other patients. In fact this simple device called anterior deprogrammer has relieved many patients from terrible migraines & spondylitis. 
It's not even a day since you are wearing it so I request you use it for a week atleast before expecting results in such a chronic case. In case of any issue please feel free to call me anytime. If you are still unsure this appliance won‚Äôt work you may return it back to me.
